gui.mae2a.pattern_rate_input_divide: Specify the number of ➗ raw materials in multiples, and the non-divisible part will be skipped
gui.mae2a.pattern_rate_output_divide: Specify a multiple of the number of ➗ products, and the non-divisible part will be skipped
gui.mae2a.pattern_rate_both_divide: Specify the number of products and raw materials in ➗ multiples, and the non-divisible part will be skipped
gui.mae2a.pattern_rate_input_multiply: Specify multiples of the quantity of ✖ raw materials
gui.mae2a.pattern_rate_output_multiply: Specify a multiple of the product quantity ✖
gui.mae2a.pattern_rate_both_multiply: Specify multiples of the product and raw material quantity ✖
